Name: Statuette of Osiris
Description: Statuette of a standing Osiris, clothed in a tight-fitting cloak. He is holding the crook and the flail and he is wearing the atef-crown with the uraeus on his forehead and the divine beard. He rests on a trapezoidal base. At a later date, a bronze plinth, circular in  cross-section, has been added.
